ing: 1 tablespoon butter, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "I never got the idea of cooking fennel until recently; it's so yummy! Amazing side dish."
ins: Heat butter and oil in a skillet over medium heat until butter is melted, about 1 minute. Add fennel to skillet; cook and stir until beginning to soften, about 5 minutes. Add onion; season with salt and pepper. Cook and stir until onion is translucent and fennel is tender, 5 to 7 minutes.
